'''1.4.6'''<ref>{{cite|url=https://mcupdate.tumblr.com/post/38375290540/minecraft-146|title=Minecraft 1.4.6|website=mcupdate.tumblr.com}}</ref> is a minor update to {{JE}}. It is the final update of 2012, released on December 20.<ref>{{cite|url=https://www.mojang.com/2012/12/minecraft-1-4-6-is-out/|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/0/https://www.mojang.com/2012/12/minecraft-1-4-6-is-out/|title=Minecraft 1.4.6 is out!|author=Jens Bergensten|website=Mojang.com|date=December 21, 2012}}</ref> It introduced [[fireworks]], [[enchanted book]]s and the [[Thorns]] enchantment. It also added a warning for users playing on soon-to-be unsupported systems (PowerPC and Java 5). While it was not the last update to 1.4, it was the last one before the snapshots of [[Java Edition 1.5|1.5]] started. This is the final version released in 2012.

A [[Java Edition 1.4.6 (pre-release)|pre-release version of 1.4.6]] was released on December 17, 2012.<ref>{{cite|url=http://www.mojang.com/2012/12/minecraft-1-4-6-pre-release/|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/0/http://www.mojang.com/2012/12/minecraft-1-4-6-pre-release/|title=Minecraft 1.4.6 Pre-release|author=Jens Bergensten|website=Mojang.com|date=December 17, 2012}}</ref> The release version of 1.4.6 differs from the reupload of the pre-release by fixing a crash issue.<ref name="finalver">{{Tweet|Dinnerbone|280707555615981568|Had to do another sneaky update for crashes. No more, I promise! :(|17 Dec 12}}</ref>

=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Nether Brick Slab JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Nether Brick Slab|Nether Brick Slabs]]'''
* Crafted using nether bricks.

=== Items ===
'''[[File:Enchanted Book.gif|32px]] [[Enchanted Book|Enchanted Books]]'''
* Enchanted books to receive a single enchantment on them.
* Can be applied to items using anvils, consuming the book.
**Enchants can be applied to any item in Creative mode.
* Sold by villagers and found in dungeon and village chests.
* Can now be found in loot chests and by trading with villagers.
* [[Unbreaking]] can be applied to anything with durability.
* [[Efficiency]] and [[Silk Touch]] can be applied to shears, allowing the harvesting of cobwebs.
* [[Sharpness]], [[Smite]], and [[Bane of Arthropods]] can be applied to axes.

'''[[File:Firework Star JE1 BE1.png|28px]] [[Firework Star]]'''
* Used to create firework rockets.
* Combine [[gunpowder]] with dyes to get a firework star with those colors used for the sparkles.
* Add [[File:Glowstone Dust JE1 BE1.png|28px]] [[Glowstone Dust]], a [[File:Fire Charge JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[fire charge]], a [[File:Diamond JE2 BE2.png|28px]] [[diamond]], a [[File:Gold Nugget JE2 BE1.png|28px]] [[gold nugget]], [[File:Feather JE2 BE1.png|28px]] [[feather]], or a {{Animate|Skeleton Skull (item) JE1 BE1.png;Wither Skeleton Skull (item) JE1 BE1.png;Zombie Head (item) JE1 BE1.png;Player Head (item) JE1 BE1.png;Creeper Head (item) JE1 BE1.png|28px}} [[mob head]] to make the firework twinkling, big, trailing, star-shaped, bursting, or creeper-shaped, respectively.
* Craft a firework star with dye to change the color that the sparkles fade to.

'''[[File:Firework Rocket JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Firework Rocket]]'''
* Non-destructive, rise up in the air, and create colorful patterns when shot by dispensers or placed by players.
* Combine [[File:Paper JE1 BE1.png|28px]] [[paper]] with [[File:Gunpowder JE1 BE1.png|28px]] [[gunpowder]] to craft a firework rocket.
* Add a firework star to add effects, or gunpowder to increase the flight duration.

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[File:Enchanted Book.gif|32px]] [[Thorns]]'''
* A new [[armor]] enchantment.
* Deals damage depending on tier to attackers.
* Wears armor out faster.

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Spawner JE2.png|32px]] [[Monster Spawner|Monster Spawners]]'''
* Can now spawn differently configured mobs with different spawn chances

=== Items ===
'''[[File:Bow JE2 BE1.png|32px]] [[Bow]]s'''
* A high pitched sound is now played when a player hits another player from far away with a bow.<ref group=note name="release change">These changes occurred between the last development version for 1.4.6 and the full release of it.</ref>

=== Mobs ===
'''[[File:Ghast JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Ghast]]s'''
* Fireballs' blast radius can now be customized

{{Animate|Skeleton JE4 BE2.png;Zombie JE2 BE1.png;Zombified Piglin JE3 BE2.png|32px}}''' [[Skeleton]]s, [[Zombie]]s, and [[Zombified Piglin|Zombie Pigmen]]'''
* The armor and enchants they spawn with now are even stronger on harder difficulties.

=== Non-mob entities ===
[[File:Arrow JE2 BE1.png|width=50x50]]''' [[Arrow]]s'''
* Now render from farther away.

'''[[Item (entity)|Item]]s and [[File:Item Frame JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[item frame]] entities'''
* Now render in 3D when using [[fancy graphics]].

=== World generation ===
'''{{EnvLink|Dungeon}}s and {{EnvLink|Village}}s'''
* Now have a random chance to have enchanted books in their chests.

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Inventory]]'''
* Items can now be dragged and dropped.
** Long pressing halves the stack before dragging.

'''[[Hotbar]]'''
* Items now show their name when switching in the hotbar.
** Can be disabled by changing <code>heldItemTooltips</code> to false in <samp>[[options.txt]]</samp>.
* Dropping items while holding {{key|ctrl}} now drops the whole stack.

'''[[File:Enchanting Table JE1 BE1.png|28px]] [[Enchantment]]s'''
* [[Efficiency]] now has no effect when using tools on the wrong block types.
* [[Fire Protection]] now extinguishes [[fire]] more quickly.
* [[Blast Protection]] now reduces [[explosion]] recoil.
* [[Protection]] is not as protective as it used to be in order to make specific enchantments more worthwhile.

'''{{Animate|Steve JE3 BE1.png;Sneaking Steve.png|28px}} Sneaking'''
* Pressing {{Ctrl|use}} while sneaking now uses the held item instead of the currently selected block.

'''[[Death message]]s'''
* Now appear in server log files.

=== General ===
'''Display'''
* Added a default resolution setting to <samp>[[options.txt]]</samp>: <code>overrideWidth:0</code> and <code>overrideHeight:0</code>.

'''[[Option]]s'''
* Added an option to toggle touchscreen mode.<ref group=note name="release change"/>

== Removals ==
=== General ===
'''[[Java Edition distance effects/Historical effects|Distance effects]]'''
* [[Falling block]] behavior has changed - they are no longer capable of infinitely producing dropped items at high coordinate values.
